document.full_text: 'kin,' bathsheba doran's exquisitely wrought comedy-drama, depicts a daisy chain of relationships while moving through a couple of generations and across several american states and two countries.
document.title: theater review | 'kin': no connection is too far, or unlikely
lines_and_colors: 'kin,' bathsheba doran's exquisitely wrought comedy-drama, depicts a daisy chain of relationships while moving through a couple of generations and across several american states and two countries.
